name: Walk my Way
description:
Submission pour the Piazza Jam (hosted by Computer James).

I chose the theme  '080-Walk my Way' , so you may hear some musical gimmick.

Made in about 10 hours This project is unfinished and unpolished. You may found some bugs.

There are not much levels at this point, but I plan to implement much more, and also new mechanics. 

For Mac users, you will have to move the app file in an other folder in order to launch the game (don't ask me why).

Feedback is more than welcome ;)
